entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Snow ending this evening then clearing. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 13 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 5:53 PM MDT Tuesday 28 March 2023
